page.title: 11SPORT
page.content: The golf club was formed in 1975.It is situated amongst woods which before was mixed woodland.An{adult membership {cost Â£306 for 1 year}and is renewed every year.The total land covered is 180 acres. The club has{600 members}and could deal with no more than 700.The club has a driving range and a putting green for members use only.Inside the club house there is a restaurant,bar and billiard table. The course is open to members of the public providing they have had some experience at golf.For the younger golfers there is a{Junior Membership } which is{Â£149.50}a year.The maximum amount of juniors allowed is 80.The club does not have any other sports facilities like tennis or squash but in the club,golf championships are held.
